recipesJson.name: Morning Pick Me UP
recipesJson.author: JenniferJarvis
recipesJson.description: Sweet simple coffee flavor.  Optionally, you can add up to 1% TFA Sweetener or 1% FLV Sweetness (if you would prefer to not have coil gunking) to sweeten the recipe even more.  Published this recipe on my website, flavor-pro.com if you want to see the full tasting notes.
